portofolio.name: Cyprus Clinic Web Design
portofolio.description: This web design was originally intended to participate in a web design contest held by the Cyprus Clinic on the 99designs platform. The design was made using the FIGMA platform and made 2 versions, namely for mobile and desktop. Unfortunately this design did not pass the initial selection stage so I decided to add it to my portfolio.

portofolio.name: Awesome IGD React-native App
portofolio.description: Awesome IGD itself is an android-based application created using the javascript programming language and using the react-native framework. This application helps users to download content on Instagram by simply copying the link to the clipboard. IGD itself stands for Instagram Downloader. This application can be accessed via the following link https://onekill0503.github.io/awesome-igd/

portofolio.name: Express Exchange (Back-end)
portofolio.description: Express exchange is a crypto trading platform. when I held this project, this project was carried out by 1 team consisting of me as a back-end developer and 2 of my friends as website designers and front-end developers. for the back-end itself, this project uses javascript technology using the nodejs engine and uses the express.js framework. I myself provide information and data to front-end engineers using the API and provide realtime notifications using websocket with the socket.io library. in 2020 I decided to stop developing this website so that this website is currently being developed by other parties. This website can be accessed using the following address https://www.express-exchange.com/

portofolio.name: Anonim Chat Telegram Bot
portofolio.description: Anonymous chat is a telegram bot to share messages anonymously on the telegram app and find random partners. This bot program was created using javascript technology using the nodejs engine and using the node-telegram-bot-api library.This program can be accessed via the following github repository https://github.com/onekill0503/anonimchat-clone.git
